## Import and prepare unclean Excel data


- Download [this dataset](https://www-genesis.destatis.de/datenbank/beta/statistic/12211/table/12211-9014) as Excel-file from [GENESIS-Online](https://www-genesis.destatis.de/genesis/online) (the main database of the Federal Statistical Office). Note: Usually it would make more sense to download the file as *flat CSV* file. We use the (unclean) Excel file here only for demonstration purposes.
